Detailed Description

Parameters of APSME-REQUEST-KEY.request primitive.

See ZigBee Specification r19, Table 4.24, page 465.

Definition at line 88 of file apsmeRequestKey.h.

Field Documentation

ExtAddr_t APS_RequestKeyReq_t::destAddress

[LE] The extended 64-bit address of the device to which the request-key command should be sent.

Definition at line 105 of file apsmeRequestKey.h.

APS_RequestKeyType_t APS_RequestKeyReq_t::keyType

The type of key being requested:

  • 0x01 = Network key,
  • 0x02 = Application key,
  • 0x04 = Trust Center Link Key.

Definition at line 110 of file apsmeRequestKey.h.

ExtAddr_t APS_RequestKeyReq_t::partnerAddress

[LE] If the KeyType parameter indicates an application key, this parameter shall indicate an extended 64-bit address of a device that shall receive the same key as the device requesting the key.

Definition at line 114 of file apsmeRequestKey.h.

APS_RequestKeyConf_t APS_RequestKeyReq_t::confirm

Canfirmation parameters.

APS_RequestKeyConf_t

Definition at line 116 of file apsmeRequestKey.h.

void(* APS_RequestKeyReq_t::APS_RequestKeyConf)(APS_RequestKeyConf_t *conf)

Callback function pointer as a handler of corresponding confirm primitive. Must not be set to NULL.
